author: Simon Difford
description: Bourbon and toffee orange. This was originally a shaken drink so in this stirred recipe I've added a splash of water to replicate the dilution imparted by shaking. However, perhaps better to forgo this and serve on-the-rocks in an old-fashioned glass.
name: Met Manhattan
recipeIngredient: 22.5 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
